# Sai Surbehera

Sai Surbehera is a Machine Learning Engineer for Walmart's Algorithmic Search Experience Team, specializing in synthetic data generation for navigation. Holds a Master’s degree in Computer Science from Columbia University and a Bachelor’s degree in Information from the University of Michigan. Professional experience includes:

- Synthetic data generation for navigation and search experience optimization at Walmart Search; responsibilities include developing and deploying algorithms to enhance search relevance and user navigation using artificial datasets.
- Price prediction algorithms, cold start models, and click-through rate (CTR) prediction models at Walmart Search; work involves building and refining machine learning models to forecast product prices and predict user engagement in e-commerce search.
- Geo-coding algorithms at Philadelphia Inquirer and Columbia Journalism; developed systems to convert addresses and location data into geographic coordinates for journalistic and data analysis applications.
- Information extraction pipelines at American Family Insurance; designed and implemented automated systems to extract structured information from unstructured insurance documents.
- Relation extraction pipelines at Mindgram; built machine learning models to identify and extract relationships between entities in text for mental health and wellness applications.
- Knowledge graph search and entity linking systems at University of Michigan Giving; engineered solutions for searching and linking entities within large-scale knowledge graphs to support philanthropic initiatives.
- Theme-matching algorithms and text summarization at University of Stellenbosch; created algorithms to match textual content to predefined themes and generate concise summaries for academic and research purposes.
- Fraud detection using GraphSage at AAA Insurance; applied graph neural networks to detect fraudulent activities in insurance data, leveraging relational patterns and network structures.

Personal interests include working on independent projects, reading and writing about philosophy, and listening to music during free time.

Contact information:  
- Email: ss6365@columbia.com  
- GitHub: https://github.com/saisurbehera

Primary location: New York City (NYC).
